title: Vibe Coding Quality Collapse
context: Developers adopt 'vibe coding' — using AI to generate entire features by describing intent in natural language, accepting output with minimal review. The approach feels magical: describe what you want, get working code. Ship fast. But the codebase accumulates debt at a rate that traditional development never could.
hypothesis: Vibe coding with AI lets developers ship features 10x faster with acceptable quality.

effects.label: Code volume explodes without proportional understanding

children.label: Developers can't explain what their own code does
Code reviews become impossible at this volume
Test coverage drops because tests aren't vibed

effects.label: Technical debt accumulates at unprecedented speed

children.label: Duplicate logic across files — AI doesn't know your codebase
Security vulnerabilities embedded in generated patterns
Developer didn't write the code, can't reason about it
AI-generated fixes often introduce new bugs
Stack traces through code nobody understands
New team members can't onboard to AI-generated code

dontIf: You're building anything that needs to be maintained for more than 6 months
You're working in a regulated industry (healthcare, finance)
Your team doesn't have senior engineers who can review AI output critically
ifYouMust: Limit vibe coding to prototypes and throwaway experiments
Require human-written tests for all AI-generated code
Mandate code review by someone who understands the domain
Set a hard rule: if you can't explain it, you can't ship it

alternatives.name: AI-assisted coding
alternatives.note: AI suggests, human decides — line by line, not feature by feature

alternatives.name: Prototype then rewrite
alternatives.note: Vibe code the prototype, then rewrite properly with understanding

alternatives.name: AI for tests only
alternatives.note: Write code manually, use AI to generate test cases

sources.title: GitClear Code Quality Report 2024
sources.note: AI-generated code shows 2x higher churn rate

sources.title: Andrej Karpathy — Vibe Coding

sources.title: OWASP AI Security Guide
sources.note: AI-generated code frequently contains known vulnerability patterns

falsifiability: Vibe-coded projects consistently maintain quality metrics comparable to traditionally-coded projects over 12 months
Code churn rates in vibe-coded projects remain under 20%/month
Teams can onboard new developers to vibe-coded codebases in under 2 weeks

seo.description: Vibe coding ships features 3-5x faster but generates +200-300% code churn, +40-80% bug density, and codebases that need rewriting within 6-12 months.
